physical_appearance:This is a set of items that include a fabric with two pieces of cloth. The fabric is white with stripes. One of the cloth has a cat image
 while the other has a globe beneath vines and a winged figure.
subject_terms_1:stripes motifs Peranakan cultural diffusion
subject_terms_2:Textiles Motifs Culture diffusion Peranakan (Asian people)
subject_terms_3:Textile art and design
sgcool_label_text:This striped white fabric is accompanied by two pieces of cloth printed with shop marks?‘N.V.HANDEL MAATSCHAPPY VORHEEN G.HOPPENSTEDT’ with a cat image on one; ‘PRIMATEXCO’ before a globe beneath vines and a winged figure on the other. It is part of a donation which contains a mixture of materials used in the making of kebayas and baju panjangs.
